verses.text: Truly my soul waiteth upon God: From him \add cometh\add* my salvation.
He only \add is\add* my rock and my salvation; \add He is\add* my defence; I shall not be greatly moved.
How long will ye imagine mischief against a man? Ye shall be slain all of you: As a bowing wall \add shall ye be, and as\add* a tottering fence.
They only consult to cast \add him\add* down from his excellency: They delight in lies: They bless with their mouth, but they curse inwardly. Selah.
My soul, wait thou only upon God; For my expectation \add is\add* from him.
He only \add is\add* my rock and my salvation: \add He is\add* my defence; I shall not be moved.
In God \add is\add* my salvation and my glory: The rock of my strength, \add and\add* my refuge, \add is\add* in God.
Trust in him at all times; ye people, Pour out your heart before him: God \add is\add* a refuge for us. Selah.
Surely men of low degree \add are\add* vanity, \add and\add* men of high degree \add are\add* a lie: To be laid in the balance, they \add are\add* altogether \add lighter\add* than vanity.
Trust not in oppression, And become not vain in robbery: If riches increase, set not \add your\add* heart \add upon them\add*.
God hath spoken once; Twice have I heard this; That power \add belongeth\add* unto God.
Also unto thee, O Lord, \add belongeth\add* mercy: For thou renderest to \add every\add* man according to his work.
